content:
OK! I am quite proud to announce that the async vision doc is now in ALPHA form:

https://nikomatsakis.github.io/wg-async-foundations/vision.html

The tenets have been replaced with a list of desired experiences. The submitted stories have been moved to an appendix. There are no combined narratives yet, but the roadmap is (I believe) complete and readable, and the User's manual of the future describes the plans in a form that can hopefully give you a good feeling for its impact. There are also clearly enumerated deliverables, each describing the intended impact as well as design notes.
Note also the list of major unresolved questions.
Hmm, some of which could use a bit of updating :)
